title: American Horror Story: Hotel | Inside: White Haired Children | FX
author: FX Networks
comment:
The Countess trying to justify her actions:
“I save them from a life of neglect, and when they’re heading down a dark path.”
Alright, we hear you. But kidnapping young children only to drink their blood isn’t helping her case.
I wanted to se more of the White Haired Children is the show, its a pity they didn't get to turn on Mother Monstar as what I assumed was going to happened at the end.
This season is on andrechrome smh 🤦‍♂️
Kidnapping of children and drinking blood? Nothing to see here folks
description:
They drink blood They live in coffins. Wanna play? Go Inside The Hotel for a look at the mysterious white haired children.
